Now it was after this , on [the northern borders of [Zululand]4-zululand]3052-the northern borders of zululand , that [Zikali]104-zikali 's Great Medicine , as [Hans]87-hans called it , really played its chief part , for without it [I]0-i think that [we]3040-we should have been killed , [every one of [us]3040-we]4947-every one of us . [I]0-i do not propose to set out the business in detail ; it is too long and intricate . Suffice it to say , therefore , that it had to do with the plots of [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas against [Cetywayo]129-cetywayo , which had been betrayed by [[his]125-umslopogaas wife]654-his wife [Monazi]114-monazi and [[her]654-his wife lover]4438-her lover [Lousta]113-lousta , [both of whom [I]0-i have mentioned earlier in this record]3056-both of whom i have mentioned earlier in this record . The result was that a watch for [him]125-umslopogaas was kept on [all the frontiers]3057-all the frontiers , because it was guessed that sooner or later [he]125-umslopogaas would return to [Zululand]4-zululand ; also it had become known that [he]125-umslopogaas was travelling in [[my]0-i company]3058-my company .

So it came about that when [my]0-i approach was reported by [spies]3059-spies , [a company]3060-a company was gathered under the command of [a man connected with the Royal House]3061-a man connected with the royal house , and by it [we]3062-we were surrounded . Before attacking , however , [this captain]3063-this captain sent [men]3228-men to [me]0-i with the message that with [me]0-i [the King]3324-the king had no quarrel , although [I]0-i was travelling in [doubtful company]3066-doubtful company , and that if [I]0-i would deliver over to [him]3324-the king [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , [Chief of [the People of the Axe]3274-the people of the axe]425-chief of the people of the axe , and [[his]125-umslopogaas followers]4691-his followers , [I]0-i might go whither [I]0-i wished unharmed , taking [my]0-i goods with [me]0-i . Otherwise [we]3062-we should be attacked at once and killed [every one of [us]3062-we]4947-every one of us , since it was not desired that [any witnesses]3071-any witnesses should be left of what happened to [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas . Having delivered this ultimatum and declined any argument as to its terms , [the messengers]494-the messengers retired , saying that [they]494-the messengers would return for [my]0-i answer within half an hour .

When [they]494-the messengers were out of hearing [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , who had listened to [their]494-the messengers words in grim silence , turned and spoke in such fashion as might have been expected of [him]125-umslopogaas .

" [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , "[125-umslopogaas] [he]125-umslopogaas said , " now [I]125-umslopogaas come to the end of an unlucky journey , though mayhap it is not so evil as it seems , since [I]125-umslopogaas who went out to seek the dead but to be filled by [yonder White Witch with the meat of mocking shadows]5400-yonder white witch with the meat of mocking shadows , am about to find the dead in the only way in which [they]5401-they can be found , namely by becoming of [their]5401-they number . "[125-umslopogaas]

" It seems that this is the case with all of [us]3062-we , [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas . "[494-the messengers]

" Not so , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn . [That child of [the King]3324-the king]5402-that child of the king will give [you]105-macumazahn safe - conduct . It is [I]125-umslopogaas and [mine]125-umslopogaas whose blood [he]125-umslopogaas seeks , as [he]125-umslopogaas has the right to do , since it is true that [I]125-umslopogaas would have raised rebellion against [the King]3324-the king , [[I]125-umslopogaas who wearied of [my]125-umslopogaas petty lot]5405-i who wearied of my petty lot and knew that by blood [his]125-umslopogaas place was [mine]125-umslopogaas . In this quarrel [you]105-macumazahn have no share , though [you]105-macumazahn , whose heart is as white as [your]105-macumazahn skin , are not minded to desert [me]125-umslopogaas . Moreover , even if [you]105-macumazahn wished to fight , there is one in [the waggon yonder]78-the waggon yonder whose life is not [yours]105-macumazahn to give . [The Lady Sad - Eyes]170-sad - eyes is as [a child]1173-a child in [your]105-macumazahn arms and [her]170-sad - eyes [you]105-macumazahn must bear to safety . "[125-umslopogaas]

Now this argument was so unanswerable that [I]0-i did not know what to say . So [I]0-i only asked what [he]3073-he meant to do , as escape was impossible , seeing that [we]3074-we were surrounded on every side .

" Make a glorious end , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , "[3073-he] [he]3073-he said with a smile . " [I]3073-he will go out with [those who cling to [me]3073-he , that is with all who remain of [[my]3073-he men]1585-my men , since [my]3073-he fate must be [theirs]1585-my men , and stand back to back on [yonder mound]5409-yonder mound and there wait till [these dogs of [the King]3324-the king]5410-these dogs of the king come up against [us]3074-we]5407-those who cling to me , that is with all who remain of my men , since my fate must be theirs , and stand back to back on yonder mound and there wait till these dogs of the king come up against us . Watch a while , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , and see how [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , [Bearer of the Axe]5412-bearer of the axe , and [the warriors of the Axe]5413-the warriors of the axe can fight and die . "[3073-he]

Now [I]0-i was silent for [I]0-i knew not what to say . There [we]3074-we all stood silent , while minute by minute [I]0-i watched the shadow creeping forward towards a mark that [the head messenger]3075-the head messenger had made with [his]3075-the head messenger spear upon the ground , for [he]3075-the head messenger had said that when it touched that mark [he]3075-the head messenger would return for [his]3075-the head messenger answer .

In this rather dreadful silence [I]0-i heard a dry little cough , which [I]0-i knew came from the throat of [Hans]87-hans , and to be [his]3075-the head messenger method of indicating that [he]3075-the head messenger had a remark to make .

" What is it ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked with irritation , for it was annoying to see [him]3075-the head messenger seated there on the ground fanning [himself]3075-the head messenger with the remains of a hat and staring vacantly at the sky .

" Nothing , [Baas]121-baas , or rather , only this , [Baas]121-baas : [Those hyenas of Zulus]5414-those hyenas of zulus are even more afraid of [the Great Medicine]1251-the great medicine than were the cannibals up north , since [the maker of it]5416-the maker of it is nearer to [them]5414-those hyenas of zulus , [Baas]121-baas . [You]121-baas remember , [Baas]121-baas , [they]5414-those hyenas of zulus knelt to it , as it were , when [we]5417-we were going out of [Zululand]4-zululand . "[3075-the head messenger]

" Well , what of it , now that [we]5417-we are going into [Zululand]4-zululand ? "[0-i] [I]0-i inquired sharply . " Do [you]121-baas want [me]0-i to show it to [them]5414-those hyenas of zulus ? "[0-i]

" No , [Baas]121-baas . What is the use , seeing that [they]5414-those hyenas of zulus are ready to let [you]121-baas pass , also [the Lady Sad - Eyes]170-sad - eyes , and [me]3076-he and the cattle with [the driver]942-the driver and voorlooper , which is better still , and all the other goods . So what have [you]121-baas to gain by showing [them]5414-those hyenas of zulus the medicine ? But perchance if it were on the neck of [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas and [he]3076-he showed it to [them]5414-those hyenas of zulus and brought it to [their]5414-those hyenas of zulus minds that [those who touch [him]3076-he who is in the shadow of [Zikali 's Great Medicine]104-zikali]5419-those who touch him who is in the shadow of zikali 's great medicine , or aught that is [his]3076-he , die within three moons in this way or in that - well , [Baas]121-baas , who knows ? "[3076-he] and again [he]3076-he coughed drily and stared up at the sky .

[I]0-i translated what [Hans]87-hans had said in [Dutch]250-dutch to [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , who remarked indifferently ,

" [This little yellow man]5420-this little yellow man is well named Light - in - Darkness ; at least the plan can be tried - if it fails there is always time to die . "[87-hans]

So thinking that this was an occasion on which [I]0-i might properly do so , for the first time [I]0-i took off the talisman which [I]0-i had worn for so long , and [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas put it over [his]125-umslopogaas head and hid it beneath [his]125-umslopogaas blanket .

A little while later [the messengers]494-the messengers returned and this time [the captain]765-the captain [himself]765-the captain came with [them]494-the messengers , as [he]765-the captain said to greet [me]0-i , for [I]0-i knew [him]765-the captain slightly and once [we]3079-we had dealt together about some cattle . After a friendly chat [he]765-the captain turned to the matter of [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , explaining the case at some length . [I]0-i said that [I]0-i quite understood [his]765-the captain position but that it was a very awkward thing to interfere with [a man who was [the actual wearer of the Great Medicine of Zikali itself]3081-the actual wearer of the great medicine of zikali itself]3080-a man who was the actual wearer of the great medicine of zikali itself . When [the captain]765-the captain heard this [his]765-the captain eyes almost started out of [his]765-the captain head .

" The Great Medicine of the [Opener - of - Roads]20-opener - of - roads ! "[765-the captain] [he]765-the captain exclaimed . " Oh , now [I]765-the captain understand why [this Chief of the People of the Axe]5421-this chief of the people of the axe is unconquerable - such a wizard that [no one]3323-no one is able to kill [him]5421-this chief of the people of the axe . "[765-the captain]

" Yes , "[0-i] [I]0-i replied , " and [you]765-the captain remember , do [you]765-the captain not , that [he]5421-this chief of the people of the axe who offends the Great Medicine , or offers violence to [him]5421-this chief of the people of the axe who wears it , dies horribly within three moons , [he]5421-this chief of the people of the axe and [[his]5421-this chief of the people of the axe household]5423-his household and [all those with [him]5421-this chief of the people of the axe]5424-all those with him ? "[0-i]

" [I]765-the captain have heard it , "[765-the captain] [he]765-the captain said with a sickly smile .

" And now [you]765-the captain are about to learn whether the tale is true , "[0-i] [I]0-i added cheerfully .

Then [he]765-the captain asked to see [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas alone .

[I]0-i did not overhear [their]3083-their conversation , but the end of it was that [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas came and said in a loud voice so that [no one]3323-no one could miss a single word , that as resistance was useless and [he]125-umslopogaas did not wish [me]0-i , [[his]125-umslopogaas friend]3085-his friend , to be involved in any trouble , together with [[his]125-umslopogaas men]1123-his men [he]125-umslopogaas had agreed to accompany [[this King]3087-this king 's captain]3088-this king 's captain to [the royal kraal where [he]125-umslopogaas had been guaranteed a fair trial as to certain false charges which had been brought against [him]125-umslopogaas]3089-the royal kraal where he had been guaranteed a fair trial as to certain false charges which had been brought against him . [He]125-umslopogaas added that [[the King]3324-the king 's captain]3091-the king 's captain had sworn upon [the Great Medicine of [the Opener - of - Roads]3230-the opener - of - roads]3562-the great medicine of the opener - of - roads to give [him]125-umslopogaas safe conduct and attempt no mischief against [him]125-umslopogaas which , as was well known throughout [the land]3243-the land , was an oath that could not be broken by [anyone who wished to continue to look upon the sun]3095-anyone who wished to continue to look upon the sun .

[I]0-i asked [the captain]765-the captain if these things were so , also speaking in a loud voice . [He]765-the captain replied , Yes , since [his]765-the captain orders were to take [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas alive if [he]765-the captain might . [He]765-the captain was only to kill [him]125-umslopogaas if [he]125-umslopogaas would not come .

Afterwards , while pretending to give [him]765-the captain certain articles out of the waggon , [I]0-i had a few private words with [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , who told [me]0-i that the arrangement was that [he]765-the captain should be allowed to escape at night with [[his]765-the captain people]3358-his people .

" Be sure of this , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , "[765-the captain] [he]765-the captain said , " that if [I]765-the captain do not escape , neither will [that captain]1554-that captain , since [I]765-the captain walk at [his]1554-that captain side and keep [my]765-the captain axe , and at the first sign of treachery the axe will enter [the house of that thick head of [his]1554-that captain]5426-the house of that thick head of his and make [friends]3149-friends with the brain inside .[765-the captain]

" [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , "[765-the captain] [he]765-the captain added , " [we]5428-we have made a strange journey together and seen such things as [I]765-the captain did not think [the world]277-the world had to show . Also [I]765-the captain have fought and killed [Rezu]88-rezu in a mad battle of ghosts and [men which alone was worth all the trouble of the journey]5430-men which alone was worth all the trouble of the journey . Now it has come to an end as everything must , and [we]5428-we part , but as [I]765-the captain believe , not for always . [I]765-the captain do not think that [I]765-the captain shall die on this journey with [the captain]765-the captain , though [I]765-the captain do think that [others]279-others will die at the end of it , "[765-the captain] [he]765-the captain added grimly , a saying which at the time [I]0-i did not understand .

" It comes into [my]3098-i heart , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , that in [yonder land of [witches]4168-witches]5433-yonder land of witches and [wizards]5350-wizards , [the spirit of prophecy]5436-the spirit of prophecy got caught in [my]3098-i moocha and crept into [my]3098-i bowels . Now that spirit tells [me]3098-i that [we]5428-we shall meet again in the after - years and stand together in a great fray which will be [our]5428-we last , as [I]3098-i believe that [the White Witch]3261-the white witch said . Or perhaps the spirit lives in [Zikali]104-zikali 's Medicine which has gone down [my]3098-i throat and comes out of it in words . [I]3098-i can not say , but [I]3098-i pray that it is a true spirit , since although [you]5438-you are white and [I]3098-i am black and [you]5438-you are small and [I]3098-i am big , and [you]5438-you are gentle and cunning , whereas [I]3098-i am fierce and as open as the blade of [my]3098-i own axe , yet [I]3098-i love [you]5438-you as well , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , as though [we]5428-we were born of [the same mother]5439-the same mother and had been brought up in the same kraal . Now [that captain]1554-that captain waits and grows doubtful of [our]5428-we talk , so farewell . [I]3098-i will return the Great Medicine to [Zikali]104-zikali , if [I]3098-i live , and if [I]3098-i die [he]104-zikali must send one of the ghosts that serve [him]104-zikali , to fetch it from among [my]3098-i bones .[3098-i]

" Farewell to [you]5438-you also , [Yellow Man]157-yellow man , "[3098-i] [he]3098-i went on to [Hans]87-hans , who had appeared , hovering about like a dog that is doubtful of [its]3099-its welcome ; " well are [you]5438-you named [Light - in - Darkness]189-light - in - darkness , and glad am [I]87-hans to have met [you]5438-you , who have learned from [you]5438-you how a snake moves and strikes , and how [a jackal]5441-a jackal thinks and avoids the snare . Yes , farewell , for the spirit within [me]87-hans does not tell [me]87-hans that [you]5438-you and [I]87-hans shall meet again . "[87-hans]

Then [he]3098-i lifted the great axe , and gave [me]0-i a formal salute , naming [me]0-i " [Chief]3387-chief and [Father]5443-father , [Great Chief]5444-great chief and [Father]5443-father , from of old "[3098-i] [Baba]266-baba ! Koos y umcool ! [Koos y pagate]267-koos y pagate ! , thereby acknowledging [my]0-i superiority over [him]3098-i , a thing that [he]3098-i had never done before , and as [he]3098-i did , so did [Goroko]168-goroko and [the other Zulus]2664-the other zulus , adding to [their]2664-the other zulus salute many titles of praise . In another minute [he]3098-i had gone with [[the King]3324-the king 's captain]3091-the king 's captain , to whose side [I]0-i noted [he]3098-i clung lovingly , [his]3098-i long , thin fingers playing about the horn handle of the axe that was named [Inkosikaas]156-inkosikaas and [Groan - maker]3501-groan - maker .

" [I]87-hans am glad [we]5446-we have seen the last of [him]3098-i and [his]3098-i axe , [Baas]121-baas , "[87-hans] remarked [Hans]87-hans , spitting reflectively . " It is very well to sleep in [the same hut]5447-the same hut with a tame lion sometimes , but after [you]5448-you have done so for many moons , [you]5448-you begin to wonder when [you]5448-you will wake up at night to find [him]3098-i pulling the blankets off [you]5448-you and combing [your]5448-you hair with [his]3098-i claws . Yes , [I]87-hans am very glad that this half - tame lion is gone , since sometimes [I]87-hans have thought that [I]87-hans should be obliged to poison it that [we]5446-we might sleep in peace . [You]5448-you know [he]3098-i called [me]87-hans a snake , [Baas]121-baas , and poison is a snake 's only spear . Shall [I]87-hans tell [the boys]636-the boys to inspan the oxen , [Baas]121-baas ? [I]87-hans think the further [we]5446-we get from [[that King]3425-that king 's captain]5451-that king 's captain and [[his]5451-that king 's captain men]1123-his men , the more comfortably shall [we]5446-we travel , especially now when [we]5446-we no longer have the Great Medicine to protect [us]5446-we . "[87-hans]

" [You]5448-you suggested giving it to [him]3098-i , [Hans]87-hans , "[0-i] [I]0-i said .

" Yes , [Baas]121-baas , [I]87-hans had rather that [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas went away with the Great Medicine , than that [you]121-baas kept [the Great Medicine]104-zikali and [he]125-umslopogaas stopped with [us]5446-we here . Never travel with [a traitor]3529-a traitor , [Baas]121-baas , at any rate in the land of [the king whom [he]125-umslopogaas wishes to kill]5454-the king whom he wishes to kill . [Kings]3464-kings are [very selfish people]5456-very selfish people , [Baas]121-baas , and do not like being killed , especially by [someone who wants to sit upon [their]5457-someone who wants to sit upon their stool and to take the royal salute stool and to take the royal salute]5457-someone who wants to sit upon their stool and to take the royal salute . [No one]3323-no one gives the royal salute to [a dead king]5459-a dead king , [Baas]121-baas , however great [he]5459-a dead king was before [he]5459-a dead king died , and [no one]3323-no one thinks the worse of [a king who was [a traitor]3529-a traitor before [he]5461-a king who was a traitor before he became a king became [a king]3525-a king]5461-a king who was a traitor before he became a king . "[87-hans]

CHAPTER XXV

[ALLAN DELIVERS THE MESSAGE]268-allan delivers the message

Once more [I]0-i sat in the Black Kloof face to face with [old Zikali]104-zikali .

" So [you]0-i have got back safely , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , "[104-zikali] [he]104-zikali said . " Well , [I]104-zikali told [you]0-i [you]0-i would , did [I]104-zikali not ? As for what happened to [you]0-i upon the journey , let it be , for now that [I]104-zikali am old long stories tire [me]104-zikali and [I]104-zikali daresay that there is nothing wonderful about this one . Where is the charm [I]104-zikali lent [you]0-i ? Give it back now that it has served its turn . "[104-zikali]

" [I]104-zikali have not got it , [Zikali]104-zikali . [I]104-zikali passed it on to [Umslopogaas of the Axe]125-umslopogaas to save [his]104-zikali life from [[the King]3324-the king 's men]5465-the king 's men . "[104-zikali]

" Oh ! yes , so [you]0-i did . [I]104-zikali had forgotten . Here it is , "[104-zikali] and opening [his]104-zikali robe of fur , [he]104-zikali showed [me]0-i the hideous little talisman hanging about [his]104-zikali neck , then added , " Would [you]0-i like a copy of it , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , to keep as a memory ? If so , [I]104-zikali will carve one for [you]0-i . "[104-zikali]

" No , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered , " [I]0-i should not . Has [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas been here ? "[0-i]

" Yes , [he]104-zikali has been and gone again , which is one of the reasons why [I]104-zikali do not wish to hear [your]0-i tale a second time . "[104-zikali]

" Where to ? [The Town of [the People of the Axe]3274-the people of the axe]587-the town of the people of the axe ? "[0-i]

" No , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , [he]104-zikali came thence , or so [I]104-zikali understood , but thither [he]104-zikali will return no more . "[104-zikali]

" Why not , [Zikali]104-zikali ? "[0-i]

" Because after [his]104-zikali fashion [he]104-zikali made trouble [there]3196-there and left some dead behind [him]104-zikali ; one [Lousta]113-lousta , [I]104-zikali believe , whom [he]104-zikali had appointed to sit on [his]104-zikali stool as [chief]3387-chief while [he]104-zikali was away , and [a woman called [Monazi]114-monazi , who was [[his]104-zikali wife]654-his wife , or [[Lousta]113-lousta 's wife]5472-lousta 's wife , or [the wife of both of [them]5474-them]5473-the wife of both of them , [I]104-zikali forget which]5470-a woman called monazi , who was his wife , or lousta 's wife , or the wife of both of them , i forget which . It is said that having heard stories of [her]5470-a woman called monazi , who was his wife , or lousta 's wife , or the wife of both of them , i forget which - and the ears of jealousy are long , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn - [he]104-zikali cut off [this woman]533-this woman 's head with a sweep of the axe and made [Lousta]113-lousta fight [him]104-zikali till [he]104-zikali fell , which [the fool]3770-the fool did almost before [he]104-zikali had lifted [his]104-zikali shield . It served [him]104-zikali right who should have made sure that [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas was dead before [he]104-zikali wrapped [himself]104-zikali in [his]104-zikali blanket and took [the woman]3332-the woman to cook [his]104-zikali porridge . "[104-zikali]

" Where has [the Axe - bearer]4995-the axe - bearer gone ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked without surprise , for this news did not astonish [me]0-i .

" [I]104-zikali neither know nor care , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn . To become [a wanderer]5479-a wanderer , [I]104-zikali suppose . [He]4995-the axe - bearer will tell [you]0-i the tale when [you]0-i meet again in the after - days , as [I]104-zikali understand [he]4995-the axe - bearer thinks that [you]0-i will do . [Hearken]132-hearken ! [I]104-zikali have done with this lion 's whelp , who is [Chaka]106-chaka over again , but without [Chaka]106-chaka 's wit . Yes , [he]4995-the axe - bearer is just [a fighting man with a long reach , a sure eye and the trick of handling an axe]5480-a fighting man with a long reach , a sure eye and the trick of handling an axe , and such are of little use to [me]104-zikali who know too many of them . Thrice have [I]104-zikali tried to make [him]4995-the axe - bearer till [[my]104-zikali garden]5481-my garden , but each time [he]4995-the axe - bearer has broken the hoe , although the wage [I]104-zikali promised [him]4995-the axe - bearer was [a royal kaross]5482-a royal kaross and nothing less . So enough of [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , [the Woodpecker]3290-the woodpecker . Almost [I]104-zikali wish that [you]0-i had not lent [him]4995-the axe - bearer the charm , for then [[the King]3324-the king 's men]5465-the king 's men would have made an end of [him]4995-the axe - bearer , who knows too much and like [some silly boaster]5486-some silly boaster , may shout out the truth when [his]4995-the axe - bearer axe is aloft and [he]4995-the axe - bearer is full of the beer of battle . For in battle [he]4995-the axe - bearer will live and in battle [he]4995-the axe - bearer will die , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , as perhaps [you]0-i may see one day . "[104-zikali]

For the tale of this meeting see the book called " [Allan Quatermain]83-allan . "[2889-editor] - [Editor]2889-editor .

" The fate of [[your]0-i friends]3617-your friends does not trouble [you]0-i over much , [Opener - of - Roads]20-opener - of - roads , "[0-i] [I]0-i said with sarcasm .

" Not at all , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , because [I]0-i have none . [The only friends of the old]5488-the only friends of the old are [those whom [they]5489-those whom they can turn to their own ends can turn to [their]5489-those whom they can turn to their own ends own ends]5489-those whom they can turn to their own ends , and if these fail [them]5489-those whom they can turn to their own ends [they]5489-those whom they can turn to their own ends find [others]279-others . "[0-i]

" [I]3105-i understand , [Zikali]104-zikali , and know now what to expect from [you]104-zikali . "[3105-i]

[He]3105-i laughed in [his]3105-i strange way and answered ,

" Aye , and it is good that [you]104-zikali must expect , good in the future as in the past , for [you]104-zikali , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , who are brave in [your]104-zikali own fashion , without being [a fool]3850-a fool like [Umslopogaas]125-umslopogaas , and , although [you]104-zikali know it not , like [some master - smith]5492-some master - smith , forge [my]3105-i assegais out of the red ore [I]3105-i give [you]104-zikali , tempering them in the blood of [men]3228-men , and yet keep [your]104-zikali mind innocent and [your]104-zikali hands clean . Friends like [you]104-zikali are useful to such as [I]3105-i , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , and must be well paid in those wares that please [them]3228-men . "[3105-i]

[The old wizard]359-the old wizard brooded for a space , while [I]0-i reflected upon [his]359-the old wizard amazing cynicism , which interested [me]0-i in a way , for the extreme of unmorality is as fascinating to study as the extreme of virtue and often more so . Then jerking up [his]359-the old wizard great head , [he]359-the old wizard asked suddenly ,

" What message had [the White Queen]3277-the white queen for [me]359-the old wizard ? "[359-the old wizard]

" [She]3277-the white queen said that [you]0-i troubled [her]3277-the white queen too much at night in dreams , [Zikali]104-zikali . "[359-the old wizard]

" Aye , but if [I]359-the old wizard cease to do so , ever [she]3277-the white queen desires to know the reason why , for [I]359-the old wizard hear [her]3277-the white queen asking [me]359-the old wizard in the voices of the wind , or in the twittering of bats . After all , [she]3277-the white queen is [a woman]3331-a woman , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , and it must be dull sitting alone from year to year with naught to stay [her]3277-the white queen appetite save the ashes of the past and dreams of the future , so dull that [I]359-the old wizard wonder , having once meshed [you]0-i in [her]3277-the white queen web , how [she]3277-the white queen found the heart to let [you]0-i go before [she]3277-the white queen had sucked out [your]0-i life and spirit . [I]359-the old wizard suppose that having made a mock of [you]0-i and drained [you]0-i dry , [she]3277-the white queen was content to throw [you]0-i aside like an empty gourd . Perchance , had [she]3277-the white queen kept [you]0-i at [her]3277-the white queen side , [you]0-i would have been a stone in [her]3277-the white queen path in days to come . Perchance , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , [she]3277-the white queen waits for [other travellers]5496-other travellers and would welcome [them]5496-other travellers , or one of [them]5496-other travellers alone , saying nothing of [a certain Watcher - by - Night who has served [her]3277-the white queen turn and vanished into the night]5497-a certain watcher - by - night who has served her turn and vanished into the night .[359-the old wizard]

" But what other message had [the White Queen]3277-the white queen for [the poor old savage witch - doctor whose talk wearies [her]3277-the white queen so much in [her]3277-the white queen haunted sleep]5499-the poor old savage witch - doctor whose talk wearies her so much in her haunted sleep ? "[3107-him]

Then [I]0-i told [him]3107-him of the picture that [Ayesha]84-ayesha had shown [me]0-i in [the water]983-the water ; the picture of [a king]3525-a king dying in [a hut]2446-a hut and of [two who watched [his]3525-a king end]3111-two who watched his end .

[Zikali]104-zikali listened intently to every word , then broke into a peal of [his]3107-him unholy laughter .

" Oho - ho ! "[3107-him] [he]3107-him laughed , ' so all goes well , though [the road]3133-the road be long , since whatever [this White One]3113-this white one may have shown [you]0-i in the fire of [the heavens above]3114-the heavens above , [she]3113-this white one could show [you]0-i nothing but truth in [the water of [the earth below]3116-the earth below]3115-the water of the earth below , for that is the law of [[our]3117-our company of [seers]3119-seers]3118-our company of seers . [You]0-i have worked well for [me]0-i , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , and [you]0-i have had [your]0-i fee , the fee of the vision of the dead which [you]0-i desired above all mortal things . "[0-i]

" Aye , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered indignantly , " a fee of bitter fruits whereof the juice burns and twists the mouth and the stones still stick fast within the gizzard . [I]0-i tell [you]0-i , [Zikali]104-zikali , that [she]3113-this white one stuffed [my]0-i heart with lies . "[0-i]

" [I]0-i daresay , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , [I]0-i daresay , but they were very pretty lies , were they not ? And after all [I]0-i am sure that there was wisdom in them , as [you]0-i will discover when [you]0-i have thought [them]5500-them over for a score of years .[0-i]

" Lies , lies , all is lies ! But beyond the lie stands Truth , as [the White Witch]3261-the white witch stands behind [her]3261-the white witch veil . [You]0-i drew the veil , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn , and saw that beneath which brought [you]0-i to [your]0-i knees . Why , it is a parable . Wander on through [the Valley of Lies]81-the valley of lies till at last it takes a turn , and , glittering in the sunshine , glittering like gold , [you]0-i perceive [the Mountain of everlasting Truth]5502-the mountain of everlasting truth , sought of [all men but found by few]5503-all men but found by few .[0-i]

" Lies , lies , all is lies ! Yet beyond [I]0-i tell [you]0-i , beauteous and eternal stands the Truth , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn . Oho - ho ! Oho - ho ! Fare [you]0-i well , [Watcher - by - Night]3383-watcher - by - night , fare [you]0-i well , [Seeker]269-seeker after Truth . After the Night comes Dawn and after Death comes what - [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn ? Well , [you]0-i will learn one day , for always the veil is lifted , at last , as [the White Witch]3261-the white witch shewed [you]0-i yonder , [Macumazahn]105-macumazahn . "[0-i]
